data.title: Cecilia and Nicholas Tse..haish..
data.meta_description: ahoj.. well, today is Monday..the beginning of weekdays..then..my boring routine will start again for another 5 days..haish.. however, for last weekend..on Saturday..i had through such an interesting experience by spending hours with one Czech family..together with Rian, Paan and Nadia..hurm..actually, i'm not really in mood to story about this family coz my mind now was haunted by…
data.text:
ahoj..

well, today is Monday..the beginning of weekdays..then..my boring routine will start again for another 5 days..haish..

however, for last weekend..on Saturday..i had through such an interesting experience by spending hours with one Czech family..together with Rian, Paan and Nadia..hurm..actually, i’m not really in mood to story about this family coz my mind now was haunted by the story of my favourite marriage couple..Cecilia Cheung and Nicholas Tse..haish..(i don’t think i can sleep well if i’m not write this down..)..

today, when i was watching clips from YouTube about my favourite Hong Kong’s pairs..Jessica and Louis..Ada Choi and Lawrence Ng..Ron Ng and Michelle Yip..and then..search their details on wiki d-addict..and suddenly..i came across Cecilia Cheung’s name..and see her profile..and it’s really shocks me..but really make me exciting and happy..when i know that she had already given birth such a cute baby boy named Lucas Tse on her marriage with my favourite cute action hero, Nicholas Tse..uhu..i’m so so so happy..then, i keep on searching about them (it has been a long time since i search about their story..)..

then, once again i got shocked..haish…but this time..not exciting or happy story but tragic and really dissappointed me..argh!!!!!so sad and unbelieveable..coz i know that at the beginning of this year, at other part of world in HK, it’s hot with the story of Edison Chen’s scandal with lots of woman..like Gillian TWINS, Bobo Cheng..and what shocks me the most, Cecilia Cheung also involve in this!! it’s acceptable if those scandals happen during her previous relationship with Edison (Edison is her ex-)..but what is so unacceptable..some of those scandal pictures was when she had engaged with Nic and just before her marriage with Nic..

how can she cheated on her husband..having scandals with the best buddy of her husband..how can a friend having scandal with his best buddy’s wife which he knows for about 20 years..what a crazy life..what a hectic life..when lust become the only things inside human….this is what will happen..lost the value of friendship..value of marriage..and value of love…

when at first i heard Nic and Cecilia getting married..i feel so happy..and admire them for their willingness to have commitment in such a young age..it’s a prove that they are really in love..and really want to spend their life together (that’s the reasons behind marriage right??)..

but now..seem that..it’s really a wrong perception of mine..pity Nic..being cheated by his beloved wife..from the news, it’s say that he won’t divorced Cecilia..and he will forgive her for what had happened..but somehow..the rumours spread that there are 2 other mans admit for having scandals with Cecilia after the marriage..and seem that Nic feel so hurt as there is possibility that Lucas is not his biological son…(really hope it’s just a stupid untrue rumours)..

i don’t even know what had happened..the true story..coz i’m an outsider..but still i’m hoping that their marriage can be saved for the sake of their son..and for the sake of me (coz i really hoping for their happy ending..)..hoping that this tragedy will become a great lesson to Cecilia..to appreciate her family…hope they are able to through this matter and save their marriage..from the latest news..seem that they are doing fine right now..and hopefully it’s a fact…

p/s: i love Nic, ‘he’ loves Cecilia..Nic loves Cecilia…i love ‘him’..Cecilia loves Nic???’he’ loves me??? Nic + Cecilia = Lucas, me + ‘him’ = ??? … such a childish equation…huhu…=p
